metadata.title: Afterglow - Secure Your Digital Legacy with Zero-Knowledge Encryption
metadata.description: Protect and pass on your digital assets—from crypto wallets to personal memories—with our automated, private safety net. Ensure your loved ones have access when they need it most, without compromising your privacy today.
metadata.keywords: Afterglow, digital legacy, digital inheritance, encrypted assets, zero-knowledge encryption, dead man switch, digital vault, crypto inheritance, digital estate planning, secure data transfer
